chapters.title: Chapter 9: Leavetakings
chapters.info: Galldrian su Riatin Rie, p. 161 (142)—King of Cairhien, Defender of the Dragonwall. He signed the parchment that was given to Domon,"Bayle Domon to deliver. He also invited Rand to his manor for a feast and party. Rand declined. See also Damodred, Barthanes; Damodred, Laman.
